conversations.conversation: I have tattoos, so I'm a trouble maker. I have curves, so I'm fat. If wear makeup, I'm fake. If I say what I think, I'm a bi**h. If I cry sometimes, I'm a drama queen. If I have guy friends, I'm a s**t. If stand up for myself, I'm mouthy. Seems like you can't do anything now a days without being labeled. So what!!! Go ahead and label me! ....See if I give a s**t! Re-post this if you're proud of who you are!!!!!
